venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description: Friday is a day to celebrate and to mourn, and what better place to celebrate or mourn than an Irish Pub? We will be celebrating the end to a long week, but also mourning Kirsten Button's decision to leave Tufts for the greener pastures of New Hampshire. So, if you feel like celebrating or mourning or just meeting some of your colleagues for a beverage, join us at PJ Ryans on Friday after work.
item.name: Jumbo Happy (and SAD) Hour
